name: distracted_boyfriend
description: A man walking with his girlfriend turns his head to check out another woman, representing being tempted or distracted by something new while ignoring what he already has.

name: mocking_spongebob
description: SpongeBob mocks or repeats someoneâ€™s words in a sarcastic tone, used to ridicule a dumb statement or mimic someone childishly.

name: megamind_peeking
description: Megamind peeks sadly from behind a corner, expressing feelings of loneliness, rejection, jealousy, or being left out while hoping to be included.

name: oprah_happy
description: Oprah enthusiastically gives gifts to everyone in her audience, symbolizing overwhelming generosity, happiness, or rewarding everyone equally.
